task.title: Install the WebDriverAgent with Katalon built-in tools

taskbody.context: From Katalon Studio version 7.2.0 onwards, you can install the WebDriverAgent with Katalon built-in tools. To do so, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Download and install a signing certificate and provisioning profile generated from an Apple Developer Account on your development machine. You can manage your signing assets via Xcode. Refer to the following Apple documents for further information:

ul.li: Create, export, and delete signing certificates.

step.cmd: Open Katalon Studio and go to Tools > iOS > Install WebDriverAgent.

image.alt: Install WebDriverAgent via Katalon built-in tools

step.cmd: Katalon Studio detects signing certificates available on your Mac. Choose the certificate generated from an Apple Developer Account.

taskbody.result: Katalon Studio will build the WebDriverAgent for you.
